name: Joint Nature Conservation Committee
goal: JNCC is the public body that advises the UK Government and devolved administrations on UK-wide and international nature conservation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: MSFD, Habitats Directive, Birds Directive, EU Biodiversity Strategy, 7EAP, LIFE programme,  BISE, WISE, NNL, MAES, Green Infrastructure, CAP, CFP and other initatives that impact nature and biodiversity, CITES
